title: Intermediate Bulk Containers (IBCs) & HDPE Drums
subtitle: Durable storage and transport solutions for liquids, chemicals, and bulk materials.
dimensions: 4′ L × 4′ W × 5′ H (1.22m × 1.22m × 1.52m) for IBCs; standard HDPE drum sizes vary
material: High-density polyethylene (HDPE) and steel cage for IBCs
tare_weight: IBC: 550 lbs (250 kg); HDPE Drum: 50 lbs (23 kg)
payload_capacity: IBC: 2,750 lbs (1,250 kg); HDPE Drum: 440 lbs (200 kg)
floor_type: IBC: Integrated base; HDPE Drum: Standard drum base

benefits.title: Safe & Durable
benefits.description: High-quality HDPE and steel ensure safe storage and long-lasting performance.

benefits.title: Versatile Use
benefits.description: Suitable for a wide variety of liquids, chemicals, and bulk materials.

benefits.title: Easy Handling
benefits.description: IBC and drum designs allow convenient transport, stacking, and lifting.

benefits.title: Certified Compliance
benefits.description: Meets UN/DOT and ISO standards for safe transport worldwide.
